title: Escape
description: In a world overrun by zombies, breathing, living friends are hard to find. Would you risk your life to save them?Nurse Alissa, her friends, and her cat Archer fight their way through a zombie-infested state to get to the safety of her mountain cabin. It offers sanctuary as well as new challenges as all the routine commodities of the modern world are now luxuries. Soon they find a new enemy to fight--cabin fever. The most exciting thing that happens to them is meeting their neighbor Chris and his dog Shithead.Bored people do stupid things. When one of their group is seriously injured and needs emergency medical assistance, the others face certain death to get help.Will they get what they need and return safely? Will Archer and Shithead ever become friends?
author: Scott M. Baker
